mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION (user_id, type, message, related_id, created_at, is_read) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{message}, #{relatedId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FALSE)
mapper.select: SELECT notification_id AS notificationId, user_id AS userId, type AS type, message AS message, is_read AS isRead, created_at AS createdAt, read_at AS readAt, related_id AS relatedId FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTIFICATION SET is_read = TRUE, read_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
